name: Horsey Beef Pretzel Bites
author: Elizabeth
summary: A roast beef sandwich made into a delicious little bite. Seasoned roast beef, smoky mozzarella, and red onion are topped with a creamy horseradish sauce! You know you want some!
ingredients: 24 each Original Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
8 ounces thinly sliced deli roast beef, cut or torn into bite-size pieces
8 ounces sliced smoked mozzarella cheese, cut into 24 pieces
¼ cup thinly sliced red onion
directions: Arrange Pretzel Crisps® onto a large tray
Top with roast beef and a piece of mozzarella cheese
Add a slice or 2 of red onion
Put a dollop (about 1/4 teaspoon) of horseradish on the onion
